projects.title: Campus Bites
projects.description: A multi-page web application designed for students to browse, create, manage, and publish recipes.
features: Secure Authentication: Implemented ASP.NET Core Identity for role-based security (User vs. Administrator)
Approval Workflow: Built a logic flow where recipes move from "Draft" to "Pending" to "Published"
Data Integrity: Utilized Entity Framework Core to manage complex relationships between Users, Recipes, Ingredients, and Categories
Admin Moderation: System for reviewing uploaded images and ingredients before public visibility
Search Functionality: Filter recipes by category and ingredients
Business Logic: Implemented strict rules, including image segregation for admin inspection before public display
